name: Sweet and Sour Sauce
briefdescription: Sweet and sour sauce made with sugar, vinegar, soy sauce, and ketchup. Delicious with meatballs and rice or a dipping sauce for spring rolls.
instructions: Place sugar, water, vinegar, soy sauce, cornstarch, and ketchup in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Stir continuously until mixture has thickened.

comments.comment: Easily found these ingredients in the pantry for a quick sweet n sour sauce. Not bad, I'd make it again when I run out of bottled plum/sweet n sour sauce.
